###User Defined Function###
_GUICtrlRebar_GetBandID

###Description###
Get the value that the control uses to identify this band for custom draw notification messages

###Syntax###
#Include <GuiRebar.au3>
_GUICtrlRebar_GetBandID($hWnd, $iIndex)

###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
$hWnd
	Handle to rebar control
$iIndex
	Zero-based index of the band
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
Success: id of the band

###Remarks###
None.

###Related###
_GUICtrlRebar_SetBandID
